Hi, you’ve reached Drew Johnson’s professional webpage. I am currently a visiting assistant professor at Brigham Young University. My area of study is algebraic geometry.

Previously, I was a did postdoctoral work at ETH Zürich in Switzerland and at the University of Oregon. I received my PhD from the University of Utah, and a BS and MS from Brigham Young University.

Contact

Office: TMCB 220

Email: d.johnson@mathematics.byu.edu
